circuit.explanation: Write the name of the court circuit (like 'First Circuit' or 'Second Circuit') where your case is being handled.

division.explanation: Write the specific division of the court (like 'Honolulu' or 'Waianae').

filed_in_open_court.explanation: Check this box if the judge gave you this order during a court hearing.

plaintiff.explanation: Write the name of the person who filed the small claims case.

defendant.explanation: Write the name of the person being sued in the small claims case.

civil_number.explanation: Write the court case number. You can find this on your other court papers.

new_court_date.explanation: Write the new date when the small claims court hearing will happen (month/day/year).

new_court_time.explanation: Write the new time for the court hearing (use regular 12-hour time, like '10:30').

time_of_day.explanation: Choose either 'a.m.' or 'p.m.' to show whether the court time is in the morning or afternoon.

courtroom_number.explanation: Write the number of the courtroom where the new hearing will take place.

clerk_date.explanation: Date when the court clerk signed this order.

clerk_signature.explanation: Signature of the court clerk who is issuing this order.
